page.title: 15HOME LIFE
page.content: {The Dining Room}is used for eating meals. Not every house has a special room for this purpose. Many people eat in their kitchens.In the dining room, you might expect to find a large wooden dining table,usually with co_ordinating chairs, that often have upholstered seats.There will often be a side_board, for storing drinking glasses,crockery,serving dishes, table mats, and tablecloths.The side board is often also a show place for glass, china,pottery,and silver ornaments, and perhaps sporting trophies and plaques.The floor is usually carpeted. The dining room is sometimes just reserved for special meals,such as birthday parties, dinner parties, and perhaps Sunday lunches,other meals being eaten in the kitchen.
